SELECT a.id, a.title, a.cover, a.like_count AS likeCount, a.view_count AS viewCount, a.collect_count AS collectCount, a.description, m.username, m.id AS userId, a.publish_time AS publishTime, GROUP_CONCAT(t.id) AS tagIds, GROUP_CONCAT(t.name) AS tagNames FROM article a
INNER JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN member m ON a.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON a.id = at.article_id LEFT JOIN tag t ON at.tag_id = t.id
AND a.category_id = #{dto.categoryId}
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.publish_time DESC
